text: Ezɨ Gideon uaghan Efraimɨn anabamɨn mɨghsɨar dozibar tintinibar itir gumaziba bagha akam amada. A kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia izighirɨ e Midianian adarazi ko mɨsogham. Egh ia mangɨ Jordanɨn Fanemɨn me bagh pɨghɨva, daghurir doziba ko emɨmɨribar me bagh gan mangɨ Betbaran nguibamɨn me bagh gan men suikigh. Puvatɨghtɨma, me Jordanɨn Fanem giregh vongɨn mangegham.”
